text: And the Gibeonites said unto him, We will have no silver nor gold of Saul, nor of his house; neither for us shalt thou kill any man in Israel. And he said, What ye shall say, that will I do for you.21.4 We willâ€¦: or, It is not silver nor gold that we have to do with Saul or his house, neither pertains it to us to kill, etc
